title: Italy Wellness Escape on the Shores of Lake Garda with Daily Breakfast, Wine Tasting & Spa Treatments
description:
Reach new heights of relaxation and truly disconnect at this charming retreat on the banks of Italy's Lake Garda. Indulgence could not be easier at this wellness hotel, with a pristine spa that beckons with saunas, Turkish baths, massages and more. Beyond the spa offerings, the hotel boasts a sun-soaked pool for those balmy evening cocktails or daytime tanning sessions.

Get your fill of Meditteranean flavours at Osteria della Pieve, offering mouthwatering traditional fare and the option to dine inside or out. When you're ready to explore, head straight to nearby Romantica Beach to appreciate the famed Garda Lake and its panoramic views, then discover the hiking trails and medieval ruins of Rocca di Manebra nature reserve.
offer_address: Viale Catullo 1, Manerba del Garda BS 25080, Italy
